passives.name: Chain Bonus
passives.desc: Deals slightly more BRV damage when using chain attacks
passives.short_desc: Chain Bonus: Increases BRV damage dealt

passives.name: Mighty Blizzard Combo
passives.desc: Slightly increases BRV damage dealt with Blizzard Combo
passives.short_desc: Mighty Blizzard Combo: Increases BRV damage dealt with Blizzard Combo

passives.name: Sage's Wisdom
passives.desc: Slightly raises Break Bonus upon inflicting Break in Sage mode
passives.short_desc: Sage's Wisdom: Raises Break Bonus

passives.name: Ability Attack Bonus
passives.desc: Slightly increases BRV damage dealt during ability chain\n*Also applies to abilities changed from BRV Attackã€? HP Attack
passives.short_desc: Ability Attack Bonus: Increases BRV damage dealt

passives.name: Mighty Multi-Hit
passives.desc: Slightly increases BRV damage dealt with Multi-Hit
passives.short_desc: Mighty Multi-Hit: Increases BRV damage dealt with Multi-Hit

passives.name: Charged Blizzard Combo
passives.desc: Blizzard Combo use +1
passives.short_desc: Charged Blizzard Combo: Raises use count of Blizzard Combo

passives.name: Charged Multi-Hit
passives.desc: Multi-Hit use +1
passives.short_desc: Charged Multi-Hit: Raises use count of Multi-Hit

passives.name: Back Attack
passives.desc: Marginally increases BRV damage dealt when attacking an enemy not targeting self
passives.short_desc: Back Attack: Increases BRV damage dealt

passives.name: Ninja War Tactics
passives.desc: Slightly raises SPD for 3 turns upon unleashing a critical hit in Ninja mode
passives.short_desc: Ninja War Tactics: Raises SPD

passives.name: Sage's Expertise
passives.desc: Largely raises MAX BRVã€? moderately raises SPD while Sage active
passives.short_desc: Sage's Wisdom: Raises MAX BRVã€? SPD

passives.name: Blizzard Combo Extension
passives.desc:
Blizzard Combo use +1

When using Blizzard Combo:
 â€¢ Large BRV damage boost
 â€¢ Triggers additional  PF attack

When using Blizzard Combo while Sage IIã€? III active:
 â€¢ BRV Attack becomes Blizzard ( PJ magic  PG attack)
 â€¢ Deals 50% HP damage to non-targets

While Sage III active:
